name: webcore-v2
description: WebCore - Advanced Content Management System with Plugin Support

scripts.install-all: npm run client-install && npm run server-install
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && npm run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run preview" "cd server && npm start"
scripts.build: npm run server-build && npm run client-build
scripts.test: npm run server-test && npm run client-test
scripts.lint: npm run server-lint && npm run client-lint
scripts.clean: npm run server-clean && npm run client-clean

author: WebCore Team
